TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CatalogZone extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase

summary.span: 用作 Web 部件控件集内的主控件，用于在网页中承载 控件。

span.span: Serves as the primary control in the Web Parts control set for hosting controls on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件控件集，在区域是包含 Web 部件控件的网页上的区域。Within the Web Parts control set, a zone is a region on a Web page that contains Web Parts controls. Web 部件区域由一个区域控件，它是一种类型的设计为包含其他控件。A Web Parts zone is created by a zone control, which is a type of designed to contain other controls. 区域的主要功能是它包含控件进行布局，并为这些控件提供常见的用户界面 (UI)。The primary functions of a zone are to lay out the controls it contains, and to provide a common user interface (UI) for those controls. 有关区域和 Web 部件应用程序中如何使用它们的常规信息，请参阅文章中类，和[Web 部件控件集概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff0149e4-695a-401a-8cda-53df6d7d2668)。For general information about zones and how they are used in Web Parts applications, see the base class, and [Web Parts Control Set Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff0149e4-695a-401a-8cda-53df6d7d2668). Web 部件控件的一个主要功能是它们根据他们的首选项，允许最终用户修改 （或个性化） 网页，并保存其个性化的设置以供将来的浏览器会话。A key feature of Web Parts controls is that they allow end users to modify (or personalize) Web pages according to their preferences, and save their personalized settings for future browser sessions. 修改 Web 部件页的一个方面包括能够添加控件或其他服务器控件添加到 Web 部件页。One aspect of modifying Web Parts pages includes the ability to add controls or other server controls to a Web Parts page. 控件提供的列表或目录的用户可以添加到页面的控件。The control provides a list or catalog of controls that users can add to a page. 控件是一个 Web 部件控件集内的基础控件。The control is one of the fundamental controls in the Web Parts control set. 它派生自类，并且其行为的大多数从该类继承。It derives from the class, and most of its behavior is inherited from that class. 类实质上是将添加到类的基类是实现的区域模板的接口。The class essentially adds to the base class a zone template, which is an implementation of the interface. 区域模板使开发人员能够以声明方式添加区域集中的页持久性格式的控件。The zone template enables developers to declaratively add controls to a zone in the page persistence format. > [!IMPORTANT] > A区域只能包含控件，并与此相反，控件可以仅位于派生自的区域类，如。A zone can contain only controls, and conversely, controls can reside only in zones that derive from the class, such as . A控件变为可见仅当用户将网页切换到目录的显示模式 ()。A control becomes visible only when a user switches a Web page to catalog display mode (). 目录可以包含几种类型的控件。A catalog can contain several types of controls. 每个控件是一种包含用户可添加到页的服务器控件的容器。Each control is a type of container that contains the server controls users can add to the page. 控件与不同，根据它们所包含的服务器控件来源于何处。The controls differ according to where the server controls they contain are coming from. 下表总结了控制提供与 Web 部件控件集并为每个控件，哪种类型的服务器控件包含。The following table summarizes the controls provided with the Web Parts control set and, for each control, what kind of server controls it contains. |控件Control|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||维护对已关闭在页面上的控件的引用。Maintains references to controls that have been closed on a page. 这些控件可以由用户重新打开 （重新添加到页）。These controls can be reopened (added back to the page) by users.| ||包含对在网页上的标记中的 Web 部件目录中声明的控件的引用。Contains references to controls that are declared in a Web Parts catalog in the markup of a Web page. 这些控件可以由用户添加到 Web 页。These controls can be added to a Web page by users.| ||提供用户界面，用户若要上载的定义文件 (具有的 XML 文件。Web 部件扩展和指定的格式，其中包含的状态信息） 来控制对目录，以便该控件可以添加到网页。Provides the UI for a user to upload a definition file (an XML file with a .WebPart extension and a specified format that contains state information) for a control to a catalog, so that the control can be added to a Web page.| 因为类将只能将一个区域模板添加到其基本类的行为，它同时具有几个成员。Because the class adds only a zone template to the behavior of its base class, it has few members. 构造函数是默认构造函数，通过该对话框，您可初始化的新实例类。The constructor is a default constructor; with it, you can initialize a new instance of the class. 属性获取或设置一个引用，对象，其中包含该区域的控件。The property gets or sets a reference to the object that contains the controls for the zone. 方法是关键。The method is critical. 它将重写基方法，以创建的所有集合区域模板中包含的控件。It overrides the base method to create the collection of all controls contained within the zone template. > [!NOTE] > 中的按钮UI 需要客户端脚本才能正常工作。The buttons in the UI require client-side scripting in order to work correctly. 如果浏览器中禁用了脚本，用户将无法执行操作通过UI。If scripting is disabled in the browser, the user will not be able to perform actions through the UI. ## 可访问性Accessibility 默认情况下，对于此控件呈现的标记可能不符合辅助功能标准，如 Web 内容辅助功能准则 1.0 (WCAG) 优先级别 1 准则。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 对于此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和以编程方式使用控件。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the control. 下面的代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使你能够更改用户控件在网页上显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on the Web page. - 自定义的文件与源代码控制和自定义被导入的目录并添加到网页的控件。A file with the source code for a custom control, and a custom control that is imported by the catalog and added to the Web page. - 声明用户控件，以及自定义网页控件。A Web page that declares the user control, and the custom control. - 如何运行该示例的说明。An explanation of how to run the example. 此代码示例的第一部分是使用户能够更改在网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#7)] 下面的代码示例的第二部分包含的代码的自定义和控件。The second part of the code example contains the code for the custom and controls. 代码控件演示如何从继承类，并通过构造函数中设置一些默认属性值自定义其属性。The code for the control demonstrates how to inherit from the class and customize its properties by setting some default property values in the constructor. 源代码还演示如何创建自定义类名为`TextDisplayWebPart`。The source code also demonstrates how to create a custom class named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 这是与关联的控件。您将此代码示例的一部分导入的 web 部件说明文件。This is the control associated with the .WebPart description file that you will import as part of this code example. 使用导入说明文件之后控件在网页上，你将能够添加`TextDisplayWebPart`到页中，完全预配置为指定说明文件中的控件。After you import the description file by using the control on the Web page, you'll be able to add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page, fully pre-configured as specified in the description file. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译，因此如果你想要运行这种方式的示例，将源代码文件，并将其添加到 Web 应用程序的根目录下的 App_Code 子文件夹。This code example uses dynamic compilation, so if you want to run the example this way, name the source code file and add it to an App_Code subfolder of your Web application's root directory. 有关演示的编译这两种方法的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview/CS/catalogSamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview/VB/catalogSamples.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例的第三部分是包含的控件的网页。The third part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls. 它包含`Register`指令用于用户控件，以及另一个用于自定义控件的源文件。It contains a `Register` directive for the user control, and another for the source file with the custom controls. 请注意，在第二个指令，它没有命名程序集，因为该示例不使用程序集，它使用动态编译与放置在 App_Code 子文件夹中的源代码。Note that in the second directive, it does not name the assembly, because the example does not use an assembly, it uses dynamic compilation with the source code placed in the App_Code subfolder. 网页上声明控件，并在其子``元素中，声明控件。The Web page declares a control, and within its child `` element, it declares a control. 虽然这是标准的 ASP.NET 控件，它将具有完整的 Web 部件功能在运行时，因为控制的包装所有服务器控件都置于与对象，以便其他服务器控件可以参与 Web部件应用程序。While this is a standard ASP.NET control, it will have full Web Parts functionality at run time, because the control wraps any server control placed in a with a object, so that other server controls can participate in Web Parts applications. 在此区域中还声明是自定义控件名为`TextDisplayWebPart`。Also declared in this zone is the custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 请注意此控件具有的属性`ExportMode="All"`在其上声明。Notice that this control has an attribute of `ExportMode="All"` declared on it. 这使你可以导出。Web 部件说明文件，其中包含该控件，可以由其他用户可以将预配置的控件添加到其他网页导入的属性值。This enables you to export a .WebPart description file that contains the property values of the control, which can be imported by other users to add the pre-configured control to other Web pages. > [!NOTE] > 若要启用要导出的描述文件的 Web 部件应用程序的用户控件，还必须启用 Web 应用程序中的导出功能，通过添加`enableExport="true"`属性设为``元素 (即子``元素) 的 Web.config 文件中。To enable users of a Web Parts application to export a description file for controls, you must also enable the export feature in the Web application by adding an `enableExport="true"` attribute to the `` element (which is a child of the `` element) in the Web.config file. 导出在默认情况下处于禁用状态，因此如果尚未启用应用程序的导出，编辑 Web.config 文件，并立即执行操作。Export is disabled by default, so if you not yet enabled export for your application, edit the Web.config file and do it now. 网页还声明自定义控件并在该``包含的元素控件。The Web page also declares the custom control and, within it, a `` element that contains an control. 用户将使用此控件在运行时导入。自定义的 web 部件描述文件控件。The user will use this control at run time to import the .WebPart description file for the custom control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview/CS/catalogzonecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview/VB/catalogzonevb.aspx#2)] 现在运行的代码示例。Now run the code example. 加载 Web 页的浏览器中。Load the Web page in a browser. 第一步是导出。Web 部件描述文件`TextDisplayWebPart`控件。The first step is to export a .WebPart description file for the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 单击 （由标题栏中的向下箭头），自定义控件上的谓词菜单，然后单击**导出**。Click the verbs menu on the custom control (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar), and click **Export**. 按照以保存该控件的描述文件的说明。Follow the instructions to save a description file for the control. 打开。Web 部件说明文件在编辑器中，并编辑标题属性文本的值。Open the .WebPart description file in an editor, and edit the value of the title property text. 查找``具有属性的元素`name="Title"`，和编辑包含开始标记和结束之间的标题文本``标记。Find the `` element that has the attribute `name="Title"`, and edit the title text that is contained between the opening and closing `` tags. 现在关闭网页，并编辑页面源文件在编辑器中。Now close the Web page, and edit the page source in an editor. 删除``控件声明元素，然后保存并关闭文件。Delete the `` control declaration element, then save and close the file. 加载再次在浏览器中的网页。Load the Web page again in a browser. `TextDisplayWebPart`控件不应出现，因为您将其删除。The `TextDisplayWebPart` control should not appear, because you removed it. 使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件，然后选择**目录**将页切换到目录模式。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Catalog** to switch the page to catalog mode. 请注意，自定义控件出现，以及与控件。Notice that the custom control appears, along with the control. 单击**浏览**按钮以找到。为导出的 web 部件说明文件`TextDisplayWebPart`控件。Click the **Browse** button to locate the .WebPart description file that you exported for the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 你可以单击**上载**、 选择导入的控件旁边的复选框，然后单击**添加**以将其添加到页面。You can click **Upload**, select the check box next to the imported control, and click **Add** to add it to the page. 单击**关闭目录**来返回到正常浏览模式的页。Click **Close Catalog** to return the page to normal browse mode. 导入的控件现在应显示在页中，并在控件的标题栏中显示的标题应添加到的标题文本。Web 部件说明文件。The imported control should now appear in the page, and the title that appears in the title bar of the control should be the title text you added to the .WebPart description file.

permission.span: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.

para.span: 你可以创建自定义类如果想要更好地控制的呈现和对目录用户界面的行为。

span.span: You can create custom classes if you want more control over the rendering and behavior of the catalog UI.

para.span: 如果不需要为控件的用户提供要添加的能力控制以声明方式，则可以直接从继承类。

span.span: If you do not need to provide users of your control with the ability to add controls declaratively, then you can inherit directly from the class.

para.span: 如果您想要使控件能够以声明方式添加，比较简单的方法是从继承类，因为它提供了基本区域模板。

span.span: If you do want to enable controls to be added declaratively, the simples approach is to inherit from the class, because it provides the essential zone template.

para.span: 如果从继承类，可以重写方法并使用要添加自定义的方法控件添加到，如果希望更好地控制以编程方式添加自定义控件添加到你的时区.

span.span: If you inherit from the class, you can override the method and use the method to add custom controls to a , if you want greater programmatic control over adding custom controls to your zone.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为控件实现区域模板通常以声明方式使用，你将很少需要创建的类使用的新实例构造函数。Because the control implements a zone template, it is usually used declaratively and you will seldom need to create a new instance of the class using the constructor. 但是，如果从继承类创建自定义区域，你可能希望使用此构造函数初始化它的一些属性值和自定义其外观。However, if you inherit from the class to create a custom zone, you might wish to use the constructor to initialize some of its property values and customize its appearance. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用的在自定义的构造函数控件。The following code example demonstrates the programmatic use of the constructor in a custom control. 构造函数用于初始化该控件的某些默认属性值。The constructor is used to initialize some default property values for the control. 下面的代码演示了自定义顶部附近声明了构造函数的类。The following code shows the custom class with the constructor declared near the top. 有关完整的代码和设置和运行示例时，所需的说明，请参阅中的示例部分类概述。For the full code and instructions required to set up and run the example, see the Example section in the class overview. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview/CS/catalogSamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview/VB/catalogSamples.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartCollection CreateCatalogParts() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function CreateCatalogParts () As CatalogPartCollection

summary.span: 创建区域中声明的每个 类型的实例。

span.span: Creates an instance of each type that is declared in the zone.

returns.span: 一个 ，引用区域中所有的 控件。

span.span: A with references to all the controls in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是，一个关键方法，因为当用户切换到目录的显示模式的页面，此方法创建所有构成 Web 部件目录的控件。The method is a critical method because when a user switches a page to catalog display mode, this method creates all the controls that make up the Web Parts catalog. 中的方法类提供的 Web 部件控件集可以创建继承自任何服务器控件类。The method in the class provided with the Web Parts control set can create any server control that inherits from the class. 因此，如果创建自定义控件并将其声明内的网页控件，当用户将页切换到目录模式时，此方法将创建您的控件。So, if you create a custom control and declare it on a page within a control, this method will create your control when a user switches the page to catalog mode. 但是，由于各种原因您可能希望控件通过方法。However, for various reasons you might want control over the method. 您可能希望其创建仅某些控件。You might want it to create only certain controls. 例如，假设你创建一组自定义具有一致的外观，属于单个产品或组织的控件。For example, suppose you create a set of custom controls that have a consistent appearance and belong to a single product or organization. 如果您想页开发人员将限制为在目录中，使用这些自定义控件，则应从继承类，请替代方法，并允许创建只有你自定义控件与相同类型的控件的方法。If you want page developers to be limited to using those custom controls in a catalog, then you should inherit from the class, override the method, and allow the method to create only controls of the same type as your custom controls.

exception.span: 当前的 控件没有 ID。

span.span: The current control does not have an ID.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.ITemplate ZoneTemplate { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property ZoneTemplate As ITemplate
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ ZoneTemplate { System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ get(); void set(System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个模板，用于在 控件中以页持久性格式包含子控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a template to contain child controls within a control in page persistence format.

value.span: 一个 ，作为区域中子控件的容器。

span.span: An that acts as a container for child controls in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性引用类型的模板用于包含区域中的控件。The property references a template of type that is used to contain the controls in the zone. 区域模板使页开发人员可以声明他们想要在持久性格式，而不是无需以编程方式创建的所有控件使用的控件。The zone template enables page developers to declare the controls they want to use in persistence format, rather than having to create all the controls programmatically. Set 访问器属性调用方法，这会强制的集合区域模板中声明的刷新页上的控件。The set accessor for the property calls the method, which forces the collection of controls that are declared in the zone template on the page to be refreshed. 这可确保，保持当前每当用户更改实际声明的模板中的页上的控件的控件区域所引用的集合。This ensures that the collection of controls referenced by the zone remains current whenever a user changes the controls actually declared within the template on the page.

para.span: 如果你想要创建自定义区域，但您计划创建以编程方式控制，而不是允许页开发人员来声明这些，你不需要区域模板支持，也可以直接从继承类。

span.span: If you want to create a custom zone, but you plan to create the controls programmatically rather than allowing page developers to declare them, you do not need zone template support, and you can inherit directly from the class.
